++ Git Checkout
GitCheckOut
01234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789
+++ SUMMARY

  * Executed with GitCommandCheckout

  * switching between different versions of a target entity 
    (files,commits,branches) on your local machine's GitRepository
  
    * Updates files in the working tree to match the version in the index or the 
      specified tree
  
    * commits:
      * Can be used to view (GitCheckout) old commits for reference (read-only)
    
    * branches:
      *  typical development with [Git]: a dedicated GitBranch is created for
         each new software feature
